'''1.4.4''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released exclusively for Android and Fire OS on June 7, 2018, which fixes one bug.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004597552-Minecraft-1-4-4-Android-Only-|title=Minecraft - 1.4.4 (Android Only)|date=June 7, 2018}}</ref> It is compatible with 1.4.2 and 1.4.3 servers.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed an issue with telemetry.</onlyinclude>
